mapper.insert: insert into db_savenumtask (ID, SOURCEID, PRODUCTID, QUANTITY, COSTPRICE, 'TYPE', OPER, CREATETIME, 'CHANGE', RELATIONID, ORIGINDESCR) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sourceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{costprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{change,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{relationid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{origindescr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_savenumtask set SOURCEID = #{sourceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCTID = #{productid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QUANTITY = #{quantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COSTPRICE = #{costprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, 'TYPE' = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, 'CHANGE' = #{change,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RELATIONID = #{relationid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORIGINDESCR = #{origindescr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select ID, SOURCEID, PRODUCTID, QUANTITY, COSTPRICE, 'TYPE', OPER, CREATETIME, 'CHANGE', RELATIONID, ORIGINDESCR from db_savenumtask where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select ID, SOURCEID, PRODUCTID, QUANTITY, COSTPRICE, 'TYPE', OPER, CREATETIME, 'CHANGE', RELATIONID, ORIGINDESCR from db_savenumtask
